      • createCustomer

        public boolean createCustomer(String username,
                              String password1,
                              String password2)
        Creates a user with role customer.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the new user, should be not null
        password1 - the password of the new user, should be not null
        password2 - verification of the password, should be not null
        Returns:
        true if successfully created a new user or false if failed to create a new user

      • deposit

        public double deposit(int id,
                      double value)
        Add the specified amount to the balance of the user with specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the desired user, should be not null
        value - the value to be added to the balance, should be not null
        Returns:
        the new balance value

      • withdrawal

        public boolean withdrawal(int id,
                          double value)
        Subtract the specified amount from the balance of the user with specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the desired user, should be not null
        value - the value to be subtracted from the balance, should be not null
        Returns:
        true if the users balance bigger than value or false if value bigger than the users balance
